name: CLKDateTextProvider
desc: A formatted string that conveys a date without any time information.

items.name: init(date: Date, units: NSCalendar.Unit)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider with the specified date and the default time zone.

items.name: init(date: Date, units: NSCalendar.Unit, timeZone: TimeZone?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider with the specified date and time zone.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone used in the formatted string.

items.name: var calendarUnits: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: The calendar units to include in the formatted string.

items.name: var uppercase: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the date string displays in uppercase.
